name: TKO K8S Resource Utilization Dashboard
description: Dashboard to view Resource Utilization for Kubernetes Cluster

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: inactive_nodes
sources.query: lag(10m, default(0, align(1m, count(lowpass(1, ts("kubernetes.node.status.condition", cluster="${cluster_name}" and condition="Ready"))))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: namespaces
sources.query: lag(10m, count(align(60s, mean, count(ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.usage" and cluster="${cluster_name}"), cluster, namespace_name))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: pod_count
sources.query: lag(10m, sum(align(60s, mean, ts("kubernetes.cluster.pod.count" and cluster="${cluster_name}"))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.
